SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS exp, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS com, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS can
FROM `reservation` r INNER JOIN `store` s ON r.str_number = s.str_number WHERE ${type} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%')
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN str_category=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS usual, SUM(CASE WHEN str_category=2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tour FROM `store` WHERE str_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%')

SELECT msrc.str_number, msrc.str_delete, msrc.mb_id, msrc.str_name, msrc.str_tel, msrc.str_address, msrc.str_category, msrc.mb_email, COUNT(CASE WHEN str_category=1 THEN CASE WHEN rsv_cmt_delete=1 THEN 1 END WHEN str_category=2 THEN CASE WHEN tour_cmt_delete=1 THEN 1 END END) AS cnt, AVG(CASE WHEN str_category=1 THEN CASE WHEN rsv_cmt_delete=1 THEN rsv_cmt_point END WHEN str_category=2 THEN CASE WHEN tour_cmt_delete=1 THEN tour_cmt_point END END) AS avg, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS exp, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS com, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS can
FROM `tour_comment` t RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT src.*, m.mb_email FROM `member` m INNER JOIN
(SELECT rc.rsv_no, rc.rsv_code, rc.rsv_cmt_point, rc.rsv_cmt_no, rc.rsv_cmt_delete, rc.rsv_delete, s.str_number, s.mb_id, s.str_name, s.str_date, s.str_tel, s.str_address, s.str_category, s.str_delete FROM `store` s LEFT OUTER JOIN
(SELECT r.str_number, r.rsv_no, r.rsv_code, c.rsv_cmt_point, c.rsv_cmt_no, c.rsv_cmt_delete, r.rsv_delete FROM `reservation` r LEFT OUTER JOIN `rsv_comment` c ON r.rsv_no=c.rsv_no GROUP BY r.rsv_no UNION
SELECT r.str_number, r.rsv_no, r.rsv_code, c.rsv_cmt_point, c.rsv_cmt_no, c.rsv_cmt_delete, r.rsv_delete FROM `reservation` r RIGHT OUTER JOIN `rsv_comment` c ON r.rsv_no=c.rsv_no GROUP BY r.rsv_no ) rc
ON s.str_number=rc.str_number)src
ON m.mb_id = src.mb_id) msrc
ON t.str_number = msrc.str_number
WHERE msrc.str_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%')
AND msrc.str_category=#{str_category}
GROUP BY msrc.str_number ORDER BY msrc.str_date DESC LIMIT #{page} , 6 ;

SELECT c.rsv_cmt_no AS no, c.rsv_cmt_content AS content, c.rsv_cmt_point AS point, c.rsv_cmt_writer AS writer, c.rsv_cmt_date AS date, DATE_FORMAT(r.rsv_day, '%Y-%m-%d') AS day, c.rsv_no AS rsv_no FROM `rsv_comment` c INNER JOIN `reservation` r ON c.rsv_no = r.rsv_no WHERE r.str_number=#{str_number} AND c.rsv_cmt_delete=1 AND ${type} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%') ORDER BY c.rsv_cmt_no DESC LIMIT #{page} , 10

SELECT tour_cmt_no AS no, tour_cmt_content AS content, tour_cmt_writer AS writer, tour_cmt_point AS point, tour_cmt_date AS date, str_number, tour_cmt_day AS day FROM `tour_comment` WHERE str_number=#{str_number} AND tour_cmt_delete = 1 AND ${type} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%') ORDER BY tour_cmt_no DESC LIMIT #{page} , 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM `store` WHERE str_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM `rsv_comment` c INNER JOIN `reservation` r ON c.rsv_no = r.rsv_no WHERE r.str_number=#{str_number} AND ${type} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%') AND rsv_cmt_delete=1
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM `tour_comment` WHERE str_number=#{str_number} AND ${type} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%') AND tour_cmt_delete=1
